external_references.source_name: CSIRT CTI MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD TONESHELL JAN 2024
external_references.description: CSIRT CTI. (2024, January 23). Stately Taurus Targets Myanmar Amidst Concerns over Military Junta’s Handling of Rebel Attacks. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has utilized a "magic packet" value in C2 communications and only executes in memory when response packets match specific values of “17 03 03” or “46 77 4d”.(Citation: CSIRT CTI MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD TONESHELL JAN 2024)
